content: temperature timepiece knitted in cid 20 e round by andrea shanti a sacred shanklet knitted over a year based on the high temperature of the day fabulous for knit-a-long projects materials needed- gauge not crucial - approx 2 000 yards worsted weight yarn in 8 colors - 24 circular needles in size 8 5mm and 10 6mm - 4-5 stitch markers - crochet hook for cid 246 xing dropped stitches resource links and tutorials cable cast on- https 1 www voutube com1watch v=jwqepmlxhuo&ust =floyu lvqe-b tcpsujppeh g&index=l 6 continental knitting­ https 1 www voutube com1watch v=3el4gqfm-r4 ribbing https //www youtube com/watch v=skdmkb1 d bxw nitting hrough the ack oop reating wisted titches k t b l c t s https //www youtube com/watch v=p5kjrsjhoaq knitting two stitches together­ https 1 www voutube com1watch v=eavvm9nmeq1 yarn over­ https 1 www voutube com1watch v=4rz9c4twsce fixing mistakes- https 1 www voutube com1watch v=double_crochet-0loe0psa &1noex=s&t =112s&list =floyu lvqe-b tcpsujppeh g tinking back- knitting backwards to fix a mistake https //www youtube com/watch v=9ebjytbvcds&list =floyu 1 vqe-b tcpsujppeh g&index=32 binding off­ https 1 www voutube com1watch v=w4tj zurvoga weaving in ends­ https 1 www voutube com1watch v=v-p4qs1vu1s blocking­ https //www youtube com/watch v=6vhrdysddzc tracking past weather http //www localconditions com/
